page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content:
{Shoppers Views
From week to week the people in our area have no pattern to what time in the week they shop.They also have no set time that they go to shop during the day.Most of these people shop at their local shopping precinct although some shop in the town centre. Most people prefer to shop near the end of the week and most people walk to the shops to do their shopping.
{TRAFFIC
There is quite heavy traffic in this area, particularly during early morning and late afternoon. There are three main reasons for this. The area is on the main southern approach to Hartlepool (the{A689}), many of the local population work in the town
